code:
export const theme = {
  colors: {
    primary: "#FF6B6B",
    secondary: "#4ECDC4",
    accent: "#45B7D1",
    success: "#96CEB4",
    warning: "#FECA57",
    error: "#FF9FF3",
    dark: "#2F3542",
    light: "#F1F2F6",
    white: "#FFFFFF",
    gray: {
      100: "#F8F9FA",
      200: "#E9ECEF",
      300: "#DEE2E6",
      400: "#CED4DA",
      500: "#ADB5BD",
      600: "#6C757D",
      700: "#495057",
      800: "#343A40",
      900: "#212529"
    }
  },
  breakpoints: {
    mobile: "480px",
    tablet: "768px",
    desktop: "1024px",
    large: "1200px"
  },
  spacing: {
    xs: "4px",
    sm: "8px",
    md: "16px",
    lg: "24px",
    xl: "32px",
    xxl: "48px"
  },
  borderRadius: {
    sm: "4px",
    md: "8px",
    lg: "12px",
    xl: "16px",
    round: "50px"
  },
  shadows: {
    sm: "0 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.24)",
    md: "0 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12)",
    lg: "0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.10)",
    xl: "0 15px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"
  }
};

sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
  colors: {
    primary: "#FF6B6B",
    secondary: "#4ECDC4",
    accent: "#45B7D1",
    success: "#96CEB4",
    warning: "#FECA57",
    error: "#FF9FF3",
    dark: "#2F3542",
    light: "#F1F2F6",
    white: "#FFFFFF",
    gray: {
      100: "#F8F9FA",
      200: "#E9ECEF",
      300: "#DEE2E6",
      400: "#CED4DA",
      500: "#ADB5BD",
      600: "#6C757D",
      700: "#495057",
      800: "#343A40",
      900: "#212529",
    },
  },
  breakpoints: {
    mobile: "480px",
    tablet: "768px",
    desktop: "1024px",
    large: "1200px",
  },
  spacing: {
    xs: "4px",
    sm: "8px",
    md: "16px",
    lg: "24px",
    xl: "32px",
    xxl: "48px",
  },
  borderRadius: {
    sm: "4px",
    md: "8px",
    lg: "12px",
    xl: "16px",
    round: "50px",
  },
  shadows: {
    sm: "0 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.24)",
    md: "0 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12)",
    lg: "0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.10)",
    xl: "0 15px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)",
  },
};
